name: Sorcery - The Shamutanti Hills
description:
You play a brave warrior set out with the task of venturing to the Mampang Fortress to reclaim the Crown of Kings and bring it back to your homeland of Analand.

Made by Pádraig Dennis, Gary O'Reilly and Conor Barron. Made with Fungus in Unity.

Based off the Steve Jackson novel "The Shamutanti Hills" from the Sorcery series.
